translations: 误解，误会（misunderstand 的现在分词形式）

sentences.sentence: I don't want there to be any misunderstanding.
I don't want this misunderstanding to come between us.
sentences.translation: 我不想让这种误解妨碍我们之间的关系。

sentences.sentence: He was the unknowing cause of all the misunderstanding.
sentences.translation: 他无意中引起了这一切误会。
